message.body: Does high cholesterol run in our family? Like, genetic-related cholesterol issues?

Hard to say...moms is low but her body is ah, anomalous...her mother had a huge history of heart related ailments. My cholesterol is genetically high as its been measured after extensive periods of regular exercise and good diet and is still high. My fath
Hmmmm..had some blood work done and apparently my cholesterol is slightly elevated...but I'm a freaking underweight vegan (well, mostly)

Have you heard if a book called "wheat belly"? It explains that the run of the mill cholesterol blood test is a calculated value and not an actual measurement of the different types of cholesterol. It's possible that you are genetically high but IMHO you
I don't want to take anything!! :-I
Good attitude although aspirin is fine ;-)
Hahaha well that I have no problem with
Especially before going to bed after a night of drinking....
B vitamins before bed help in that circumstance as well...
I did the research...
Haha yes, well, I have a bottle of b vitamin complex specifically reserved for those rare occasions...
Oh, speaking of, what kind of fancy water do you want at your disposal at the wedding?
Planning is everything...speaking of that- you've hit the "less than one month mark"...nervous?
Nah just antsy, let the planning be done! Haha
Well we're excited. It's going to be a great weekend...did you spend a night in your new house yet?
Not yet...we're getting a new bed so we still have to order it and get it set up...helloo memory foam topper!
What's this weekend look like for you guys??

Dan's flying out to new orleans today for his bachelor party...I'm doing yoga and dinner with a friend tomorrow, and have a driving lesson Saturday (I'm learning stick! ) but other than that I'm just hanging out and packing stuff up
Well have fun and tell Dan to stay safe...well be around all weekend and I know you didn't forget that Sunday is Mothers Day. E is taking M out for dinner but I'm not sure where
Okay...yeah there's something in the mail, it prob won't arrive until next week though...i'll call sunday!
Good child
